verbs.description: To [V: hear] [ARG1: many in the media tell it] , President Trump ’s withdrawal from the Iran Deal was the worst thing to happen since he was elected .

To hear many in the media tell it , President Trump ’s withdrawal from the Iran Deal was the worst thing to happen since he [V: was] elected .
To hear many in the media tell it , President Trump ’s withdrawal from the Iran Deal was the worst thing to happen since [ARG1: he] was [V: elected] .
